comments.comment:
Eya nemei adhagena nawe media walin.a manussaya kiyanne wayidya widyawen wadha pethi kiyala deyak na kiyala thahavuru kara.ampara hamu una tablet eka gana pareekshana sidu wemin pawathinawa thawama awasan nomathi nisa hariyatama eka thahavuru karanna ba kiyala.api mee harak wage mewa balala media walin ahana gon prashna walata
Ugath doctors lawa haallu karan nathuwa mulinma me kiyanne mokakda mekata dena piluthura mokakda kiyala oluwen Kalpana karala balalai theeranayak ganna ona.ehema nathuwa ekek dekek mokak hari kiyala comment ekak dapu paliyata wela Yana paththata yanawa wage okkama un ekama deya anumatha karala comments danne nathuwa ekek hari oluwen Kalpana karala hari de katha karanna balanna.nikamda kiyanne ape sinhalu mee harak KIYALA.meken oppu wenawa me video ekata comments dapu ekek wath ugath kamak tiyena un nemei kiyala.yako media walin kiyana okkama his mudunin baaraganna epa.oluwen Kalpana karala theendhu karanna.
comments.author: Madu Perera
